SELECT t1.task_as_no taskAsNo, t1.task_no taskNo, t1.user_no_operator userNoOperator, t1.assignment_time assignmentTime, t1.dict_op_no dictOpNo, ifnull( t1.from_date, '' ) fromDate, ifnull( t1.to_date, '' ) toDate, ifnull( t1.operation_description, '' ) operationDescription, ifnull( t1.target_qty, '' ) targetQty, ifnull( t1.assignment_state, '' ) assignmentState, ifnull( t2.dict_op_name, '' ) dictOpName, ifnull( t3.user_true_name, '' ) userOperatorName FROM ot_task_assignment t1 LEFT JOIN ot_dict_operations t2 ON t1.dict_op_no = t2.dict_op_no LEFT JOIN ot_app_user t3 ON t1.user_no_operator = t3.user_no
and t1.task_no = #{taskNo} and t1.user_no_operator = #{userNoOperator} and t1.assignment_time = #{assignmentTime} and t1.dict_op_no = #{dictOpNo} and t1.operation_description = #{operationDescription} and t1.target_qty = #{targetQty} and t1.assignment_state = #{assignmentState}
